title: Re-downloaded League, stuck at "Step 1/2: Updating Interface"
body:
So I redownloaded LoL after being unable to log in (it will get stuck on "Logging on/in" for like...forever.  But now, I can't even download it.  It'll just get stuck on "Step 1/2: Updating Interface | *insert four digit number* MB (*insert three digit number KBps)" and it's always at 0%.....
Help ;~;

replies.body: Getting stuck at 0% might be an issue with a corrupt patcher or a setting with your OS that is preventing it from updating.  As a first step, please go over our [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) guide to try and get this resolved.  Be sure to select the mac section for instructions specific to your OS.  Please let me know if your issue persists, and we can look at some more options.

1. Do you have enough free space on your Hard Drive / Solid State Drive?
2. If you do, restart your computer and your router / modem then try downloading again.
3. If the above doesn't work, proceed to;

[Visit Heimy’s Workshop to patch these issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/c5/Heimerdinger_PiltoverCustomsSkin_old.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20120118075912
Oh right, I forgot to add that I'm using a MacBook Air (I know it sucks, but I can't get another computer) OS X Yosemite 10.10.5 and I have never gotten this problem before.
